scene_description_enriched: The scene depicts the Flagellation of Christ. Christ, with a halo and wounds, stands bound to a column. Four figures surround him, two on each side, inflicting blows with whips and rods. The figures on the left wear a yellow tunic and a green tunic, while those on the right wear a blue tunic and a pink tunic. The background is a rich gold, suggesting a divine or significant setting, framed by architectural elements including arches and a column. The floor is tiled in red.
